trends: There have been 74 other sightings in Stephenville
There were 5 other sightings in Stephenville on or around November 18th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was traveling West in the 1300 block of West washington when I saw a series of flashing lights in the sky to the Southwest. The lights went in sequence 1,2,3 this happened two times and then dissapeared. Other people that I work with saw the same thing. The lights appeared to be yellow in color. I have never seen anything like it before, and I dont know what it could have been.
